example_sentence_english: I am looking for green eyes.
The color of the eye is green.
A tear falls from my eye.
He put ice on the eye.

notes: no contraction with con before vowels
example_sentence_english: I look with my left eye.

example_sentence_italian: È evidente agli occhi di tutti.
example_sentence_english: It is evident to everyone's eyes.
We look into each other's eyes.
He keeps the glasses on his eyes.

notes: no common contraction with con + gli in modern use
